channel.title: Kruger-Da on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Kruger-Da on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Realistic Expectation
item.description: Here we use the Kruger-Dunning effect to show what happens if you do not acquire real-world comptences and instead get stuck in a narrative or ideology that you take, by default as true, because you avoid testing it in the real world.
